title: Special Offer For Travel Agents At New Luxury PropertyTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Special Offer For Travel Agents At New Luxury Property Published on : Friday, September 4, 2015
For only $65 USD per night, Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts is offering travel agents a fantastic opportunity to stay at its newest property, the Luxury Bahia Principe Samana, a Don Pablo Collection resort located in one of the most picturesque areas of the Caribbean in Samana, Dominican Republic. Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts is a luxury resort division under one of the world’s leading travel companies Grupo Piñero based in Mallorca, Spain. Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts features 23 properties (four in Spain) and 18 resorts in the Dominican Republic, Mexico and Jamaica.
“It is important for us that travel agents know our product first-hand in order to recommend it to their clients, “said Julio Perez, Executive Vice President of Bahía Principe Hotels & Resorts. “The best way for agents to sell our resorts is by experiencing them and discovering the difference of our superior standards and comprehensive services, activities and amenities we provide each and every guest,” added Perez.
The special offer is for travel agents and their companion. The agent rate is only $65.00 USD per person per night, all-inclusive and there is no single supplement. The offer is valid from November 1-December 20, 2015 and payment should be made prior to check-in. Agents must show proof of identity upon check-in. Agents can book their stay by emailing Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts at:reservations@bahia-principe.com. The Luxury Bahia Principe Samana will officially open onNovember 1, 2015.
Need more incentive? Luxury Bahia Principe Samana is a boutique style 149-room Adult Only resort with most rooms providing stunning views of Samana Bay and the Caribbean Sea. The beachfront location offers many water activities as well a quick boat shuttle to the public beach of Cayo Levantado – one of the Caribbean’s best beaches. It is ideal for couples seeking romance and personalized premium service – this Victorian style resort offers butler service.
Pamper yourself in spacious guest rooms with king-size canopy beds, hydromassage bathtub, satellite TV, mini-bar, coffee machine and many other room amenities. Treat your taste buds to a range of culinary delights at its three top restaurants – international cuisine at La Plantacion buffet, seafood in the Pescador restaurant and fine dining at the Orguidea gourmet restaurant. Luxury and relaxation never tasted so good.
Close to the resort there are many activities from spotting humpback whales during the mating season to going on horseback through a rainforest to Salto del Limón and viewing a spectacular waterfall. The resort is also located close to Playa Rincón, ranked as the second best beach in the world.
Luxury and more at an incredibly low price. Samana is an increasingly popular destination for couples, honeymooners and families. Agents can be ahead of the curve and use this opportunity to visit and experience the Bahia Principe difference first-hand.
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts are well-known for their exceptionally high standard of service, cuisine, guest rooms and resort amenities and activities and have garnered many awards for its resorts, cuisine and service. Since 1995 when they opened their first resort, the Bahia Principe San Juan in the Dominican Republic the brand has grown to 12 properties in that country, four resorts in Mexico and two in Jamaica.
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts offers vacationers options depending on their interest and budget. For the ultimate in luxury, the Luxury Bahia Principe Don Pablo Collection caters to the most sophisticated traveler with spacious, well-appointed suites to personalized butler service to unlimited dining options. Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts features properties geared towards families with activities to satisfy all ages as well as select Adult-only properties.
Source:- Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts
